full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Title
E6MON-23PQKO - Period 03 - RMSO - Kosher Meals

## Reference Information
Reference Number: WS3954773790-Doc3983019682
Amendment Number: 0
Solicitation Number: WS3954773790

## Tender Details
* Category: Goods
* UNSPSC Code: *50111500
	+ Description: Minimally processed meat and poultry products
* Trade Agreements: Various (see below)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (excluding NCR)

## Tender Status
* Tender Status: Expiring
* Tender Closing Date: January 4, 2024 2:00 PM EST

## Description
Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the acquisition of kosher meals located in Quebec, as detailed in Annex A. All bidders must submit their supporting documentation and bid no later than 2:00 PM EST on January 4, 2024. Bids received after the specified closing time will be declared non-responsive.

## Instructions to Bidders
To access the tender package and submit your bid, please visit: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18118463?extsite=MTgxMTg0NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Points of Contact
For any questions or concerns, please contact Ly, Selina (SPAC/PSPC) at selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Trade Agreements Covered
This tender is open to bidders who are eligible to bid under the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

Note: This is a Request for Standing Offer and not a traditional Request for
